name: PolyStellar
description:
A pre-alpha  game that i been working on , still there is a lot of bugs and the game play is not ready , this is just as and prototype or a concept to show off the planet generator, there is no real game play jet. 

Controllers are WASD, E for gun , right click for flashlight , left click to shoot, space bar for scan,

Ship controllers W is forward, Shift + W is turbo, rotation is with mouse
